short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Many Penny records prices and promotions from supported sites without collecting personal info.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance the grocery shopping experience in Canada with Many Penny for Google Chrome, a streamlined extension that anonymously shares product prices from major Canadian stores, without using your personal data.

Automatic Sharing: While you browse or shop online at top Canadian grocery stores, Many Penny operates in the background, collecting current pricing data and adding it to our extensive database.
Privacy First: We only collect product, price and promotion information, ensuring your personal details remain private.
Community Benefits: Your data helps create a comprehensive view of national pricing trends, aiding all Canadian shoppers.

Install Many Penny with a click, browse and shop as you usually would, and contribute to Canada's largest grocery pricing resource.

Join a community effort to ensure fair pricing and informed shopping choices across Canada. With Many Penny, you're not just saving money; you're driving transparency in grocery pricing.

Install Many Penny for Google Chrome and be part of a smarter shopping experience in Canada!
